project_descr: Undertake a Minamata (Mercury) Initial Assessment to identify the national mercury challenges and the extent to which legal, policy and regulatory framework will enable Suriname to implement future obligations under the Minamata Convention.

outputs.output_descr: Undertake a Minamata (Mercury) Initial Assessment to identify the national mercury challenges and the extent to which legal, policy and regulatory framework will enable Suriname to implement future obligations under the Minamata Convention.
